about_the_game:
The CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Lingering Scent of Summer ALL in ONE Pack is here!
Technically speaking, it's fall now, but the heat hasn't faded yet!
To help keep you going through the heat, we're bringing you another pack full of warm weather content!

3 costume sets
1 studio mode background
11 studio mode items
6 events
7 yotogi skills
1 dance

Here's what will be added to your game:
【Costume】
*Light Summer Dress Set
*Battle Jumpsuit Set
*Reticence Swimsuit Set

【Studio Mode Items】
*Watermelon Slices
*Kiddie Pool
*Kiddie Pool with Water
*Ramune Soda
*Grill
*Grilled Saury
*Grilled Corn
*Meioh-dan Fireworks: Blue
*Meioh-dan Fireworks: Green
*Meioh-dan Fireworks: Purple
*Meioh-dan Fireworks: Red

【Yotogi Class】
*Maniac Play Maid
*Hard Restraint Play Maid

【Yotogi Skill】
*Restraint Piledriver Sex
*Restraint Piledriver Anal Sex
*Dog Play Doggy Style Sex
*Dog Play Doggy Style Anal Sex
*Restraint Cowgirl Position 2
*Restraint Cowgirl Position Anal 2
*Hentai Rimjob

【Events】
*On a hot, sweaty day
*Summer vacation in the countryside
*Under the starry sky
*Relax every once in a while
*Just like a married couple
*Let's harvest together!
*One good turn deserves another

-Compatible heroine types-
*Muku
*Majime
*Rindere

【Dance】
*Wondering beads

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications. Some scenes may be interpreted as non-consensual sex. Please be advised that there are BDSM scenes in this DLC. If you are uncomfortable with the above content, we recommend you refrain from playing.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
